434.en: the first person pivots to the left-forward direction, then twists their body for a full circle. the second raises their left hand and lightly grips the right hand of the first person. the second then places their right hand on the back of the first person, and they both stand face-to-face.
434.zh: 第一个人向左向前旋转，然后扭转身体一整圈。第二个人举起左手，轻轻握住第一个人的右手。然后第二个人将右手放在第一个人的背上，两人面对面站着。

435.en: one person takes a step to the left front of the other with the left foot, turns left, lifts the right foot, swings the left hand down from the other's right arm to the waist. at the same time, the other crosses left foot over right and lifts left heel, holds one person's right hand with the left hand, and raises it over one person's head.
435.zh: 一个人用左脚向另一个人的左前方迈出一步，向左转，抬起右脚，左手从另一个人的右臂向下摆动到腰部。与此同时，另一个人左脚交叉在右脚上，抬起左脚后跟，左手握住一个人的右手，举过一个人的头顶。

436.en: the first one twists to the right, straightens his/her body, pulls the other person to their right side with the right foot; the second one twists to the right, straightens their body and extends the left foot.
436.zh: 第一个人向右扭转，伸直身体，用右脚将另一个人拉到他们的右侧;第二个人向右扭转，伸直身体，伸出左脚。

437.en: the two individuals step out with the right foot to the right side and twist 180 degrees. one person bends their knees and raises the tips of their feet.
437.zh: 两个人右脚向右侧踏出并扭转180度。一个人弯曲膝盖并抬起脚尖。

438.en: the two individuals take a step to the right while pivoting 90 degrees.
438.zh: 两个人向右迈出一步，同时旋转90度。

439.en: one person takes a step forward with their left leg and leans forward until the two people are close together. the other person places their right hand on the back of one person and wraps their arm around them.
439.zh: 一个人左腿向前迈出一步，向前倾身，直到两个人靠得很近。另一个人将右手放在一个人的背上，并用手臂搂住他们。

440.en: the other person releases their left hand to the left side, extends it straight, turns left, takes a step back with their left foot while extending their right hand and holding onto one's left arm. one releases their right hand and raises it to the right side, turns right, takes a step back with their right foot.
440.zh: 另一个人将左手向左侧释放，伸直，左转，左脚后退一步，同时伸出右手并握住自己的左臂。一个人释放右手并向右侧举起，右转，右脚后退一步。

441.en: one person takes a step to the left with the right foot, and the other steps to the right with the left foot.
441.zh: 一个人用右脚向左迈出一步，另一个人用左脚向右迈出一步。

442.en: the first person takes one step to the right with the left foot, and takes one step back with the right foot. the second takes one step to the left with the right foot, and one step forward with the left foot.
442.zh: 第一个人左脚向右迈出一步，右脚后退一步。第二个右脚向左迈出一步，左脚向前迈出一步。

443.en: the first person rises onto the right toe, bends the left knee and lifts the body towards the left direction. the second lifts the left foot off the ground and stands on tiptoe, turning the head towards the left and slightly bending the right knee.
443.zh: 第一个人抬起右脚趾，弯曲左膝并向左抬起身体。第二个将左脚抬离地面，踮起脚趾站立，将头转向左侧，并稍微弯曲右膝。

444.en: one takes a step back with their right foot, leans backward, while the other person takes a step forward with their left foot and embraces the other person with their right arm.
444.zh: 一个人右脚后退一步，后倾，另一个人左脚向前一步，用右臂拥抱对方。

445.en: one person looks toward the other person, who spreads out their arms.
445.zh: 一个人看着另一个人，后者张开双臂。

446.en: one person retracts the right foot while the other person withdraws the left foot.
446.zh: 一个人收回右脚，而另一个人收回左脚。

447.en: the first one retracts their right leg, while the second one withdraws their left leg.
447.zh: 第一个人收回右腿，而第二个人收回左腿。

448.en: one person moves the right leg back, while the other step forward with the left leg.
448.zh: 一个人将右腿向后移动，另一个人将左腿向前一步。

449.en: one takes back the left leg and steps to the left, while the other takes back the right leg and steps to the right.
449.zh: 一个人收回左腿并向左迈出，另一个人收回右腿并向右迈出。

450.en: two individuals stand closely together, with one placing their left hand on the other's right shoulder and grasping their left hand with their right hand. meanwhile, the other places their right hand on one's back.
450.zh: 两个人紧紧地站在一起，一个左手搭在另一个的右肩上，另一个则用右手握住左手。另一个人则将右手放在自己的背上。

451.en: two people embrace each other and spin around to the left for one and a half circles. then they stand sideways, and the first one reaches out their left hand to hold onto the second one's right hand extended forward.
451.zh: 两个人互相拥抱，向左旋转一个半圈。然后侧身站立，第一个伸出左手，握住第二个向前伸出的右手。

452.en: two individuals are facing each other, dancing the social dance.
452.zh: 两个人面对面，跳着社交舞。

453.en: the two people maintain dance postures while standing still. one person turns their head to the left, while the other person turns their head to the right.
453.zh: 两人保持舞蹈姿势，一动不动。一个人将头转向左边，而另一个人将头转向右边。

454.en: the first person holds the left hand horizontally, and the second is behind the first person holding the first person's left hand with their left hand, and placing their right hand on the right side of the first person's waist. the first person holds their right hand horizontally and both individuals take a step forward synchronously towards the left direction.
454.zh: 第一个人水平握住左手，第二个人在第一个人身后，用左手握住第一个人的左手，并将右手放在第一个人腰部的右侧。第一个人水平握住右手，两个人同步向左向前迈出一步。

455.en: the first person places their right hand on the second's left arm and left hand on their right shoulder. then, the second raises their left arm and passes their right hand under the first person's armpit, completes a clockwise rotation.
455.zh: 第一个人将右手放在第二个人的左臂上，左手放在右肩上。然后，第二个人举起左臂，将右手放在第一个人的腋窝下，完成顺时针旋转。

456.en: one took a step to the left and pointed the left leg backwards, then turned the head to the right. accordingly, the other took a step forward with the right foot and turned the head to the left.
456.zh: 其中一个人向左迈出了一步，将左腿向后指向，然后将头转向右侧。相应地，对方右脚向前迈出一步，将头转向左侧。

457.en: the first one takes a step forward to the left with the right leg, and the other person follows by taking a step to the left. then both resume standing side by side.
457.zh: 第一个人用右腿向左向前迈出一步，另一个人紧随其后，向左迈出一步。然后两人恢复并排站立。

458.en: the first person takes a big step forward with their right leg, and the second takes a step forward with their right leg towards the first person's left.
458.zh: 第一个人用右腿向前迈出一大步，第二个人用右腿向前迈出一步，向第一个人的左侧迈出一步。

459.en: one person places both hands behind their back, then rotates their body 45 degrees clockwise, followed by 90 degrees counterclockwise, then 90 degrees clockwise, and finally 45 degrees counterclockwise. the other raises their left hand and switches to their right, then rotates their body 45 degrees clockwise, and raises their right hand and switches to their left, then rotates their body 360 degrees counterclockwise.
459.zh: 一个人将双手放在背后，然后顺时针旋转身体45度，然后逆时针旋转90度，然后顺时针旋转90度，最后逆时针旋转45度。另一个人举起左手并切换到右侧，然后顺时针旋转身体45度，并举起右手并切换到左侧，然后逆时针旋转身体360度。

460.en: one person releases the right hand while rotating the body to the right, then extends the right hand to the same level as the shoulder. the other person releases the left hand while rotating the body to the left, then extends the left hand to the same level as the shoulder.
460.zh: 一个人松开右手，同时向右旋转身体，然后将右手伸出到与肩膀相同的高度。另一个人松开左手，同时将身体向左旋转，然后将左手伸出到与肩膀相同的高度。

461.en: two individuals move the right foot forward to get close, then pull the left foot back, take a step back and spread apart, and retract the right foot.
461.zh: 两个人将右脚向前移动以接近，然后将左脚拉回，后退一步并散开，然后将右脚收回。

462.en: the two individuals approach each other and then start dancing in unison.
462.zh: 两个人互相靠近，然后开始一致跳舞。

463.en: the first one initiates movement by extending one foot to move the second one. the two individuals extend their legs at nearly the same time, with the second one stepping backward and the first one stepping forward before turning 90 degrees clockwise.
463.zh: 第一只脚通过伸出一只脚来移动第二只脚来开始移动。两个人几乎同时伸展双腿，第二个人向后一步，第一个人向前一步，然后顺时针旋转90度。

464.en: both individuals simultaneously step sideways to the left.
464.zh: 两个人同时向左侧身一步。

465.en: one person is seated on a chair while the other person forcibly pulls them up from the chair and takes a seat with crossed legs themselves.
465.zh: 一个人坐在椅子上，另一个人强行将他们从椅子上拉起来，自己盘腿坐下。

466.en: one person is on the phone, the other person runs towards one person and taps the left shoulder using the right hand. one person greets by swinging the left hand briefly.
466.zh: 一个人正在打电话，另一个人跑向一个人并用右手轻拍左肩。一个人短暂挥舞左手来打招呼。

467.en: one person rises slowly from a squat and falls forward, not landing steadily and supporting themselves with both hands. the other points at one person with their right hand and laughs heartily, then falls forward and lands on the ground.
467.zh: 一个人从深蹲中慢慢站起来，向前跌倒，落地不稳，用双手支撑自己。另一人则用右手指着一个人，开怀大笑，然后向前倒在地。

468.en: one person is seated on a chair before another person approaches and pulls them upwards from the chair. then, one takes the seat.
468.zh: 一个人坐在椅子上，然后另一个人走近并将他们从椅子上向上拉。然后，一个人就座。

469.en: the first one chases after the second one as they run forward. suddenly, the first one catches up and starts striking the other with punches and kicks. as a result, the second one falls to their knees.
469.zh: 第一个追赶第二个，向前奔跑。突然，第一个人追上了，开始拳打脚踢。结果，第二个人跪倒在地。

470.en: one person approaches the other person from behind and startles them abruptly. consequently, the other person jumps and looks back alarmed.
470.zh: 一个人从后面接近另一个人，突然把他们吓了一跳。结果，对方吓了一跳，回头一看。

471.en: one person dashes past the other while the other person cheers beside.
471.zh: 一个人冲过另一个人，另一个人在旁边欢呼。

472.en: the first person seated on the ground while the second strains to help the first person stand up, then they depart together.
472.zh: 第一个人坐在地上，第二个人竭尽全力帮助第一个人站起来，然后他们一起离开。

473.en: the two people take a step forward together, but the first one accidentally steps on the other person's foot.
473.zh: 两个人一起向前迈出一步，但第一个人不小心踩到了对方的脚。

474.en: one person walks up behind the other and asks for something, to which the other responds by raising both hands gesturing to not knowing anything.
474.zh: 一个人走到另一个人身后，要求一些东西，另一个人举起双手，做什么都不知道的样子。

475.en: the two persons move towards each other by dancing in a peculiar way and then depart simultaneously.
475.zh: 两个人以一种奇特的方式跳舞，互相靠近，然后同时离开。

476.en: the first person rushes towards the second and nearly trips, the second steadies them.
476.zh: 第一个人冲向第二个人，差点绊倒，第二个人拦住了他们。

477.en: the first person throws an object to the other person, who dodges it.
477.zh: 第一个人向另一个人扔物体，另一个人躲开了它。

478.en: one is holding their forehead with their hand and falls to the ground. the other person quickly helps one up.
478.zh: 一个人用手捂住额头，倒在地上。对方很快就把一个扶起来。

479.en: the first one stumbles and falls down. the second one bends down to lift the first one up from the ground.
479.zh: 第一个绊倒了。第二个弯腰将第一个从地上举起来。

480.en: two people sit side by side, the first one slumps into the chair and falls asleep. one person taps on the other's shoulder and prompts them to stand up and answer a question, causing the other to quickly jump up and begin responding.
480.zh: 两个人并排坐着，第一个人倒在椅子上睡着了。一个人轻拍另一个人的肩膀，提示他们站起来回答问题，导致另一个人迅速跳起来开始回答。

481.en: the first person walks forward, while the first one approaches the first person and bows repeatedly. the first person waves his/her hand and hooks his/her shoulder with the other person's, and they walk forward together.
481.zh: 第一个人向前走，第一个人走近第一个人并反复鞠躬。第一个人挥手，用另一个人的肩膀勾住肩膀，一起向前走。

482.en: two people are walking down the street, and suddenly one of them squats down.
482.zh: 两个人正在街上走，突然其中一个蹲了下来。

483.en: one person runs towards another person with joy and gives them a pat on the head. the other person blushes and covers their mouth shyly.
483.zh: 一个人高兴地跑向另一个人，并拍拍他们的头。对方脸红了，害羞地捂住了嘴。

484.en: one person sneaks up behind the other person and suddenly smacks the other person's right shoulder, startling them.
484.zh: 一个人偷偷溜到另一个人身后，突然拍打对方的右肩，把他们吓了一跳。

485.en: two individuals bid farewell, and one gives something forgotten to the other person.
485.zh: 两个人告别，一个人将忘记的东西送给另一个人。

486.en: two individuals approach each other from opposite directions. one of them accidentally trips the other, causing them to fall to the ground. the other individual angrily points their finger at one and begins to scold them.
486.zh: 两个人从相反的方向接近对方。其中一个不小心绊倒了另一个，导致他们摔倒在地。另一个人愤怒地用手指指着其中一个人并开始责骂他们。

487.en: two people are playing soccer, and one of them dribbles the ball around the other person.
487.zh: 两个人正在踢足球，其中一个人带球绕过另一个人。

488.en: two people are walking hand in hand, suddenly one person releases the other's hand, the other person crosses their arms and walks away unhappily.
488.zh: 两个人手牵着手走，突然一个人松开了另一个人的手，另一个人抱着双臂，闷闷不乐地走开了。

489.en: the two people are moving towards each other. the right foot of one person accidentally steps on the right foot of the other person. the other person retaliates by stepping on the right foot of one person twice with their left foot.
489.zh: 两个人正在走向对方。一个人的右脚不小心踩到了另一个人的右脚。另一个人用左脚踩一个人的右脚两次作为报复。

490.en: one person alternates squatting and pulling on a rope with both hands, while the other rushes over to snatch the item on the rope beside one person.
490.zh: 一人交替蹲下，双手拉绳，另一人则冲过去抢一人身边绳子上的东西。

491.en: the first one stands with arms akimbo. then, the second one comes up behind the first one and discreetly taps their butt with their knee. the first one stumbles forward and runs off.
491.zh: 第一个双手叉腰站着。然后，第二个人来到第一个人的后面，用膝盖轻轻地拍他们的屁股。第一个人跌跌撞撞地向前跑了。

492.en: two persons stand back to back. after that, the two turn around and face each other, pointing their fingers towards each other, making gestures and arguing passionately.
492.zh: 两个人背靠背站着。之后，两人转身面对对方，用手指指着对方，做手势，激烈争论。

493.en: one picks up an object from the ground, takes a few steps sideways facing the other, and throws the object to the ground in front of the other. the other then lifts up the object.
493.zh: 一个人从地上捡起一个物体，面向另一个人侧向迈出几步，然后将物体扔到另一个人面前的地上。另一个然后举起物体。

494.en: the first person bows deeply towards the second, and then the second lifts the first person up with both hands while holding his face.
494.zh: 第一个人向第二个人深深鞠躬，然后第二个人用双手将第一个人举起来，同时捂住他的脸。

495.en: the first person is standing in place and looking up at the sky. the second walks a few steps towards the first person, swaying their body and waving at the first person. the first person pushes the second aside with both hands, then continues to look up at the sky.
495.zh: 第一个人站在原地仰望天空。第二个人向第一个人走了几步，摇晃着身体并向第一个人挥手。第一个人用双手将第二个人推开，然后继续抬头仰望天空。

496.en: two individuals stand facing each other, then proceed to bow to one another. afterward, each of them takes two steps forward and embrace each other with arms wide open.
496.zh: 两个人面对面站立，然后互相鞠躬。随后，他们各自向前迈出两步，张开双臂拥抱在一起。

497.en: the first person takes a step forward, raises the right hand and knocks on the door, meanwhile the second sits up and rubs the eyes using both hands.
497.zh: 第一个人上前一步，举起右手敲门，第二个人坐起来，用双手揉眼睛。

498.en: the two people walk side by side. one presents an object to the other person while walking and the other person nods in agreement.
498.zh: 两个人并肩而行。一个人在走路时向另一个人展示一个物体，另一个人点头表示同意。

499.en: one person stands while the other runs clockwise around one person. one person observes and nods their head from side to side.
499.zh: 一个人站着，另一个人绕着一个人顺时针跑。一个人观察并左右移动他们的头。

500.en: one person questions angrily at the other, grabs and shakes the other person. the other falls to the ground and is immediately beaten by one person.
500.zh: 一个人愤怒地质问另一个人，抓住并摇晃对方。另一人倒在地，立即被一人殴打。
